overview: In 2002, documentarian made his first "Art Safari" style film about the German photographer Andreas Gursky. It contains the ‘famous’ ‘Is it Gursky? in Reading’ ‘sketch’ and the European languages ‘sketch’. The documentary is the first art comedy documentary by Ben Lewis, featuring 20 years of gags about the art world stored up and released in this film.
tagline: A profile of artist, Andreas Gursky. Director Ben Lewis tries to find out what makes him tick and what it is like to live in "Gursky World".
title: Gursky World
